definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: diminish, restrain, withdraw (NH id., Aram. [[גְּרַע]] gra9 shave head, etc.; cf. jari9a swallow)—

diminish, usually sq. [[מִן]] Ex 5:8, Ex 5:19 (the tale of bricks), De 4:2, De 13:1 (in both, word of ´[[י]]; opp. [[הוסיף]]) cf. Ec 3:14, and also Je 26:2 (c. acc.); c. acc. also Ex 21:10 (food etc.) cf. Ez Eze 16:27; Pt. pass. diminished, clipped, of beard, Je 48:37 and Is 15:2 (so Baer, rightly, cf. his note and v. [[גדע]]).

restrain Job 15:4 (c. acc. [[שִׂיחָה]] meditation, devotion), Job 15:8 (c. acc. [[חָכְמָה]], sq. [[אֵלֶיךָ]], i.e. unto, for thyself, monopolize; De Di Da render draw unto thyself, appropriate; Schult. comp. Ar. swallow, cf. Ew saugst zu dir ein Weisheit).

withdraw Job 36:7 (obj. [[עַיִן]], eye, sq. [[מִן]]); Ez Eze 5:11 absol. (si vera l.); Co. reads [[אֶתְגׇּרֶה]], for [[אֶגְרַע]], on intern. grounds; others: withdraw (thy needs) Sm (cf. Eze 16:27); withdraw (mine eye) Ges Ke.
be withdrawn c. [[מִן]] Nu 36:3, Nu 36:3, Nu 36:4 (inheritance, [[נחלה]]); Nu 27:4 a name out of a family; Ex 5:11 ([[מֵעֲבׂדַתְכֶם דָּבָר]]); impers. Le 27:18 (abatement shall be made).
be restrained sq. inf. Nu 9:7. Pi. Impf. [[יְגׇרַע]] Job 36:27 withdraw = draw up c. acc. [[נִטְפֵי־מָָיִם]] cf. Di (on other hand, De al. draw down, let down).
